items.sentence: There's no question that Tom has done a great job.
Tom and Mary have been to Australia several times.
It wasn't as interesting as I thought it would be.
Tom and I used to play together when we were kids.
Tom checked the back door to see if it was locked.
Did you find out why Tom was kicked out of school?
Tom should be able to do that in less than a week.
Tom has been a construction worker for many years.
Tom isn't sure whether Mary can understand French.
I was wondering if this was grammatically correct.
